snippet.title: Midnight Dreams Trailer EN - GamesCom Latam
snippet.description:
In “Midnight Dreams,” players will take on the perspective of Felipe, a boy with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) and a unique view of the world around him.
While in a coma, Felipe finds himself trapped in a nightmare within a space station.
Players delve into Felipe’s deepest fears, accompanying him on his quest for freedom, truth, and forgiveness.
